#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long int data;
data hcf(data n1, data n2)
{
    if (n2!=0)
       return hcf(n2, n1%n2);
    else 
       return n1;
}
 
data comb(data n,data k)
{
	data j,c=1,d;
	if(n<k)
	return 0;
	if(k>n-k)
	k=n-k;
	for(j=1;j<=k;j++)
	{
		d=hcf(c,j);
		c=c/d;
		c*=(n-j+1)/(j/d);
	}
	return c;
}
int main()
{
	data n,k,m,sum,p,i,e,f;
  double a1,a2,a3;
		sum=0;
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
		data a[k+1];
		for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
		for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
		{
			if(i!=m)
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		p=a[m];
		if((sum+p)<n)
		printf("-1\n");
		else if(p==1)
		printf("0\n");
		else
		{
			n=n-1;
			p=p-1;
			e=comb(sum,n);
			f=comb(sum+p,n);
			a1=e;
			a2=f;
			a3=(1-a1/a2);
			printf("%.6lf\n",a3);			
		}
	return 0;
}
